0.text: Innate - Rage Gene:  Mini Gnar generates 4 / 7 / 11 (based on level)  Rage over 2 seconds upon dealing or receiving damage. Against non-champions, basic attacks and  Boomerang Throw instantly generate「 0.5 / 0.875 / 1.375 (based on level) Rage. 」「 12.5% of the amount. 」 Against champions,  Boomerang Throw instantly generates「 1 / 1.75 / 2.75 (based on level) Rage, 」「 25% of the amount, 」and basic attacks instantly generate「 2 / 3.5 / 5.5 (based on level). 」「 50% of the amount. 」 Boomerang Throw can only generate Rage once per cast, and grants Rage based on the first enemy hit. Gnar's Rage decays after being out of combat for 13 seconds.
0.html: Innate - Rage Gene: Mini Gnar generates 4 / 7 / 11 (based on level) Rage over 2 seconds upon dealing or receiving damage. Gnar's Rage decays after being out of combat for 13 seconds.

1.text: At maximum Rage, Gnar's abilities are switched to  Mega Gnar's abilities for 4 seconds. Casting one of Mega Gnar's abilities will cause him to transform into  Mega Gnar, else he will transform automatically after the 4 seconds have elapsed.
1.html: At maximum Rage, Gnar's abilities are switched to Mega Gnar's abilities for 4 seconds. Casting one of Mega Gnar's abilities will cause him to transform into Mega Gnar, else he will transform automatically after the 4 seconds have elapsed.
markedPassages: Mega Gnar's
Mega Gnar

2.text: Gnar's  Mega form lasts for 15 seconds, with his Rage bar depleting as an indication of remaining time. Rage cannot be generated while in this form. Afterwards, Gnar returns to  Mini Gnar, retaining his  current percentage health and becoming too  tired to generate Rage for 15 seconds.
2.html: Gnar's Mega form lasts for 15 seconds, with his Rage bar depleting as an indication of remaining time. Rage cannot be generated while in this form. Afterwards, Gnar returns to Mini Gnar, retaining his  current percentage health and becoming too tired to generate Rage for 15 seconds.
markedPassages: Mega
Mini Gnar
current percentage health
possibleConcerningAbilities: Rage cannot be generated while in this form.

3.text: Gnar gains different stat bonuses based on whether he is in  Mini or  Mega form. Both of Gnar's forms share their ability cooldowns.
3.html: Gnar gains different stat bonuses based on whether he is in Mini or Mega form. Both of Gnar's forms share their ability cooldowns.
markedPassages: Mini
Mega

0.text: Innate: Gnar gains  bonus movement speed,  bonus attack range,  attack speed, as well as attack speed growth.
0.html: Innate: Gnar gains  bonus movement speed,  bonus attack range,  attack speed, as well as attack speed growth.
markedPassages: bonus movement speed
bonus attack range
attack speed

0.text: Active: Gnar throws a boomerang in a line in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies in its path and  slows them for 2 seconds. After reaching its maximum range or hitting an enemy, the boomerang flies back toward Gnar based on his current movement, dealing 50% damage to subsequent targets.
0.html:
Active: Gnar throws a boomerang in a line in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies in its path and slows them for 2 seconds.

After reaching its maximum range or hitting an enemy, the boomerang flies back toward Gnar based on his current movement, dealing 50% damage to subsequent targets.
markedPassages: slows

1.text: Catching the boomerang while it is returning back refunds 40% of the ability's  total cooldown.
1.html: Catching the boomerang while it is returning back refunds 40% of the ability's  total cooldown.
markedPassages: total cooldown

2.text: Enemies can be hit only once per pass.
2.html: Enemies can be hit only once per pass.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Enemies can be hit only once per pass.

0.text: Passive: Gnar's basic attacks  on-hit and ability hits apply a stack of Hyper to enemies for 3.5 seconds, refreshing on subsequent applications and stacking up to 3 times.
0.html: Passive: Gnar's basic attacks on-hit and ability hits apply a stack of Hyper to enemies for 3.5 seconds, refreshing on subsequent applications and stacking up to 3 times.
markedPassages: on-hit

1.text: The third stack against a target consumes them all to deal bonus magic damage, capped at 300 against  monsters, and grant Gnar 20 / 40 / 60 / 80% (based on  GNAR!'s rank)  bonus movement speed that decays over 3 seconds.
1.html: The third stack against a target consumes them all to deal bonus magic damage, capped at 300 against monsters, and grant Gnar 20 / 40 / 60 / 80% (based on GNAR!'s rank)  bonus movement speed that decays over 3 seconds.
markedPassages: monsters
20 / 40 / 60 / 80% (based on GNAR!'s rank)
bonus movement speed

2.text: Gnar gains Hyper's  bonus movement speed when he leaves  Mega form.
2.html: Gnar gains Hyper's  bonus movement speed when he leaves Mega form.
markedPassages: bonus movement speed
Mega

0.text: Active: Gnar  leaps to the target location, then gains  bonus attack speed for 6 seconds.
0.html: Active: Gnar leaps to the target location, then gains  bonus attack speed for 6 seconds.
markedPassages: leaps
bonus attack speed

1.text: If Gnar lands on a unit he will  bounce 500 units further in the same direction.
1.html: If Gnar lands on a unit he will bounce 500 units further in the same direction.
markedPassages: bounce

2.text: Landing on an enemy deals them physical damage and  slows them by 80% for 0.5 seconds.
2.html: Landing on an enemy deals them physical damage and slows them by 80% for 0.5 seconds.
markedPassages: slows

3.text: Gnar will not bounce if he is  immobilized, excluding from  sleep(bug), during the first leap.
3.html: Gnar will not bounce if he is immobilized, excluding from sleep(bug), during the first leap.
markedPassages: immobilized
sleep

4.text: Boomerang Throw can be cast during the dash. Hop will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
4.html: Boomerang Throw can be cast during the dash. Hop will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
markedPassages: Boomerang Throw
possibleConcerningAbilities: Boomerang Throw can be cast during the dash. Hop will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Innate: Gnar gains the following increases to his base statistics: 100 − 831 (based on level) base health, 3.5 − 54.5 (based on level) base armor, 3.5 − 63 (based on level) base magic resistance, and 8 − 50.5 (based on level) base attack damage.  Gnar's base stats including these bonuses are provided at the top of Gnar's gameplay article, and will appear separately as Mega Gnar on list articles.
0.html: Innate: Gnar gains the following increases to his base statistics: 100 − 831 (based on level) base health, 3.5 − 54.5 (based on level) base armor, 3.5 − 63 (based on level) base magic resistance, and 8 − 50.5 (based on level) base attack damage. Gnar's base stats including these bonuses are provided at the top of Gnar's gameplay article, and will appear separately as Mega Gnar on list articles.

1.text: Gnar restores health equal to the amount gained when transforming into Mega Gnar, but will only retain his current percentage health when returning to Mini form. This is not affected by healing modifiers.
1.html: Gnar restores health equal to the amount gained when transforming into Mega Gnar, but will only retain his current percentage health when returning to Mini form. This is not affected by healing modifiers.

0.text: Active: Gnar throws a boulder in the target direction that stops upon hitting an enemy, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies upon impact and  slowing them for 2 seconds. The boulder then remains on the ground for 6 seconds.
0.html: Active: Gnar throws a boulder in the target direction that stops upon hitting an enemy, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies upon impact and slowing them for 2 seconds. The boulder then remains on the ground for 6 seconds.
markedPassages: slowing

1.text: After 0.3 seconds, Gnar can pick up the boulder by moving within 90 units of it, refunding 70% of the ability's  total cooldown.
1.html: After 0.3 seconds, Gnar can pick up the boulder by moving within 90 units of it, refunding 70% of the ability's  total cooldown.
markedPassages: total cooldown

0.text: Active: Gnar slams his arm down in the target direction, dealing physical damage to all enemies struck within the area and  stunning them for 1.25 seconds.
0.html: Active: Gnar slams his arm down in the target direction, dealing physical damage to all enemies struck within the area and stunning them for 1.25 seconds.
markedPassages: stunning

0.text: Active: Gnar  leaps to the target location and deals physical damage to nearby enemies upon impact. After a 0.25-second delay, additional enemies in a larger radius also take the same damage.
0.html: Active: Gnar leaps to the target location and deals physical damage to nearby enemies upon impact. After a 0.25-second delay, additional enemies in a larger radius also take the same damage.
markedPassages: leaps

1.text: If Crunch is used to transform, Gnar will still be able to  bounce as per  Hop. Crunch's area of effect occurs in both areas, though enemies can only be damaged once.
1.html: If Crunch is used to transform, Gnar will still be able to bounce as per Hop. Crunch's area of effect occurs in both areas, though enemies can only be damaged once.
markedPassages: bounce
Hop

2.text: Enemies Gnar lands directly on top of are affected by Hop's  slow.
2.html: Enemies Gnar lands directly on top of are affected by Hop's slow.

3.text: Crunch will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

1.text: Mega Gnar - Active: Gnar thrusts in the target direction,  knocking away nearby enemies up to 590 units in that direction, though not through terrain, and afterwards dealing them physical damage, as well as  slowing them by 45% after a 0.4-second delay for a duration.
1.html: Mega Gnar - Active: Gnar thrusts in the target direction, knocking away nearby enemies up to 590 units in that direction, though not through terrain, and afterwards dealing them physical damage, as well as slowing them by 45% after a 0.4-second delay for a duration.

knocking away
slowing

2.text: Enemies that collide with terrain take  50% increased damage instantly and are  stunned instead of  slowed.
2.html: Enemies that collide with terrain take 50% increased damage instantly and are stunned instead of slowed.
